name: Thirty to Fifty Feral Hogs
description:
Oh no! Within 3 to 5 minutes of your small kids going out to play, your yard has been swarmed with 30 to 50 feral hogs! Use your completely justified assault rifle to pick them off before they pick off your kids!

Thirty to Fifty Feral Hogs is a fast-paced arcade shooter based on the extremely strange viral tweet. I made it over 2 days.

Features a pixel font by Chris Early and CC0 sound effects from freesound.org. All other sound, music, art, and code was done by myself.
